column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Awesome Chicago style pizza!!! I had the pequod and Lou back to back within the two days on my Chicago trip and comparing the two pizzeria
column3: not as greasy. I wouldn't necessarily say one is better than the other
column4: more so that they are cater to two different customer group. If you want a crunchier crust and not as heavy in taste
column5: you would like Lou's pizza. Make sure tho to get their buttercrust
column6: that's what they are famous for.
